sections.heading: corporation; suit authorized.Any dissolved corporation may be sued by its corporate name upon any cause of action accrued against such corporation or which but for such dissolution would have accrued, with the same effect as if it had not been dissolved

sections.text:
25-312.01.Dissolved corporation; suit authorized.

Any dissolved corporation may be sued by its corporate name upon any cause of action accrued against such corporation or which but for such dissolution would have accrued, with the same effect as if it had not been dissolved.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 447, ยง 15.
